body_html:
@hfutxrg I see, thanks for the explanation. Yes, in that case I think the issue is that the tensorflow and models repos are out-of-sync.

Wrt distributed training, have you seen the following:
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim#training-a-model-from-scratch
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/deployment/model_deploy.py

Hope that helps!

body:
@hfutxrg I see, thanks for the explanation.  Yes, in that case I think the issue is that the tensorflow and models repos are out-of-sync.

Wrt distributed training, have you seen the following:
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim#training-a-model-from-scratch
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/deployment/model_deploy.py

Hope that helps!
